product_name: Timex Vibration Shock Digital Watch - Men's
long_description: The rugged, shockproof Expedition watch from Timex features a sealed resin construction to resist water to 200 meters, withstand hostile weather and forge stream crossings at peak performance.
short_description: The rugged, shockproof Expedition watch from Timex features a sealed resin construction to resist water to 200 meters, withstand hostile weather and forge stream crossings at peak performance.
